header.title: Psycho-Pass
header.description: In a dystopian future, the Sibyl System determines the mental state of citizens.

list.title: Steins;Gate
list.description: A group of friends discover time travel and must prevent a dystopian future.

list.title: Gurren Lagann
list.description: Simon and Kamina fight against the Beastmen to save humanity.

list.title: Ghost in the Shell
list.description: Major Motoko Kusanagi fights cybercrime in a futuristic Japan.

list.title: Mobile Suit Gundam
list.description: Amuro Ray pilots the RX-78-2 Gundam to fight against the Principality of Zeon.
